Not bad. Some look a little sparse and the models are a little sharp edged. Having said that, I'm very happy that we are finally getting IVAs. Oh and the MK3 Crew Cab looks pretty cool.

 Thank you for the hard work.
Wow, these look fantastic. Maybe SQUAD needs to put you to work on revamping the old IVAs, there's going to be quite the disparity between them otherwise!

[http://i.imgur.com/7rGeXeB.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/7rGeXeB.jpg)

This and this alone makes me want to throw money at you. I've had to make a reticle out of an antenna for as long as I can remember.

> 
> Yes! Those look spectacular! I love how the Mk3 Crew Cabin looks like a passenger airliner cabin! (Airplane! 2, anybody?!)

I nominate Jeb to blow the computer

side note: these IVA's are just begging to be walked/floated around in.

This...is an April Fool's joke right? There's no way these can be in the game. I mean, they'd put the EAS-1's IVA to shame, the quality clash will just jar so badly, I can't think why Squad would want to do that. Or are these going to be part of the Day 1 DLC pack, that would make more sense?

Very nice work!

I have two requests: 

1. Could we get some more diversity in the cockpit computer displays? The same "K-OS error" screen appears all over the Mk3. I'd like to see a startup screen, some command line stuff, maybe some C# code in one, for variety.

2. Science Lab: I love the separate labels for "tests" and "tubes"! But players will think of the lab's main in-game purpose: cleaning experiments for re-use. Would you consider re-labeling some of these "compartments," to refer to cleaning supplies? Brooms, dustpans, Jeb's old socks (if people would understand these are being used as cleaning rags, lol) - maybe references to major brand cleaning products - use [Proctor and Gamble website](http://www.pg.com/en_US/brands/index.shtml) for inspiration - many of their brands are international ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

sweet. new hotness for our IVA's. I to would be intrested in knowing if those MFD's on the mk3 cockpit are funtional. Even if they cant be changed like with RPM it would be cool if they all work and are not just glowy stickers.
They're so.. BEAUTIFUL!!!

You can double click on most of the windows to zoom in (it works with the old IVA's as well). Tthe hud line is at the horizon and center of the view for docking and other alignment needs. 

Also now you can double click on one of the side windows and see behind you, fighter jet style.
